title: Create Media Buy Async Response - Working
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for create_media_buy when status is 'working'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the operation is actively processing (typically completes within 120 seconds). The parts.data is optional for this status - if provided, it should include buyer_ref for operation identification.

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy being processed. Optional but recommended for tracking and operation identification.

examples.description: Working status with buyer_ref for tracking

notes: parts.data is optional for 'working' status - the TextPart provides human-readable progress information
If parts.data is provided, buyer_ref is recommended for operation identification
Most 'working' status updates may only include a TextPart without a DataPart
